amendment.description: To revoke the exclusivity of certain entities that are responsible for violations of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act, the False Claims Act, and other certain laws.

action.text: Amendment SA 2109 proposed by Senator Sanders.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2109, under the order of 5/23/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 9 - 88. Record Vote Number: 109.
